subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Higher usage limits for GPT-4o compared to free tier; limits are dynamic and not a fixed token count but based on capacity, approximately 5-10x more messages than free users.
5x more usage than the free tier; estimated at ~500,000 tokens per day, with limits resetting daily.
Included within Google One AI Premium plan, which also includes 2TB of storage. No specific token limit, but fair use policy applies.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: Estimated 20-30% of active individual users on platforms like OpenAI and Anthropic use a paid subscription plan. Enterprise adoption of per-token models remains dominant.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price competition driving down input token costs. Introduction of highly efficient, smaller 'utility' models (e.g., Claude 3 Haiku) at unprecedented low prices. Major shift towards bundling premium AI access into broader consumer subscriptions (Google One, Microsoft 365).
